import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Api } from '../API/Api' import { endPoints } from '../API/Endpoint' import My_Profile_Action from '../Store/Action/My_Profile_Action' const EditProfile = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const userdata = useSelector(state => state.MyProfileReducer?.userDetail) console.log(userdata) useEffect(() => { console.log if (localStorage.getItem("logintoken")) { My_Profile_Action(dispatch) } }, []) const submit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const reqpayload = { date_of_birth: e.target.dob.value, first_name: e.target.fname.value, last_name: e.target.lname.value, mobile: e.target.mobile.value } console.log(reqpayload) Api.post(endPoints.UPDATE_USER_DETAIL, reqpayload).then((res) => { console.log(res) }).catch((err) => { console.log(err) }) } return ( <>

My profile

First Name
Last Name
Email Address
Mobile Number Verified
Date of Birth
Back
) } export default EditProfile
